title: Handshake Medium Skin Tone

adjectives: A gesture of accord and mutual respect.
verbs: To signify a pact or to welcome someone warmly.
nouns: A symbol of unity, trust, and a completed transaction.

description: Two hands meeting in a handshake, symbolizing agreement, greeting, or a deal. This is the default representation without specific skin tones.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the handshake emoji with medium skin tone depicts two hands meeting in a firm, professional clasp, rendered with Apple's characteristic smooth gradients and realistic lighting. The subtle shading and soft rounded edges give the hands a tangible feel, conveying trust, agreement, and collaboration. This emoji is a clear visual representation of partnership and positive connection in digital conversations on Apple devices.
